text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump You are doing nothing to respond to the coronavirus crisis and rising death toll. You literally spend your days snark tweeting, watching TV, holding a daily infomercial campaign rally disguised as a task force briefing, and calling Rudy and Hannity for advice.  Failure & asshole.
